definition: فر farra i (farr, فرار firār, مفر mafarr) to flee, run away, run off, escape (من from) │ فر هاربا (hāriban) to flee, take to one’s heels IV to put (ه s.o.) to flight VIII to open up or part (عن so that s.th. becomes visible); to bare, show (عن the teeth when smiling), reveal (عن s.th.); to shimmer, gleam
